title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Security
summary: Implement secure user authentication with MFA for the self-service banking portal.
description: Develop a secure authentication module that supports user registration, login, and password management, enhanced with multi-factor authentication mechanisms such as OTP, email verification, or biometric options. This EPIC ensures the system protects sensitive financial data while providing a seamless and secure login experience for customers.

title: Responsive User Interface Development
summary: Design and build a responsive, user-friendly interface adaptable to desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Create an intuitive and visually appealing user interface for the banking portal that adapts seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes. This involves designing consistent layouts, responsive components, and accessible navigation, ensuring an optimal customer experience regardless of device used.

title: Personalized Dashboard
summary: Develop a personalized dashboard displaying user profile, banking products, and relevant services.
description: Create a dynamic dashboard that presents users with personalized financial information, account summaries, eligible products, and shortcuts to frequently used services. The dashboard should pull data from the core banking system and adjust available options based on the user's profile and authorization level.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable users to submit account opening and service modification requests via streamlined workflows.
description: Implement functionalities allowing customers to initiate account openings and modify existing services directly through the portal. Develop guided, step-based workflows requiring minimal inputs and clicks. Support the ability to save incomplete applications and resume them later, ensuring ease of use and customer convenience.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time tracking of user requests and automated email notifications.
description: Introduce a robust notification and tracking system to keep customers informed about the progress of their submitted requests. Users should receive timely updates and email alerts about changes in status, approvals, or additional documentation requirements, fostering transparency and engagement.

title: Document Upload and Management
summary: Allow secure upload, storage, and retrieval of user documents through the portal interface.
description: Create a secure document management feature that enables users to upload and attach necessary documentation for account and service requests. Implement encryption, validation, and integrity checks to ensure secure handling of personal and financial files throughout the process.

title: Role-Based Access Control Implementation
summary: Establish role-based access controls for managing user permissions and visibility.
description: Develop and enforce a role-based access control framework that ensures users access only the features and data appropriate for their profiles and authorization levels. This includes administrative roles, standard customers, and special service categories, enforcing strong segregation of duties.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the portal with the bankâ€™s existing core banking system for synchronized operations.
description: Build a middleware integration layer that connects the self-service portal with the core banking platform. This synchronization ensures customer data, transactions, and service requests are accurately reflected in both systems while maintaining optimal performance and reliability.

title: Data Security and Audit Trail Management
summary: Implement comprehensive data security, auditing, and interaction history tracking.
description: Enhance data protection by implementing encryption standards, secure data storage, and a complete audit trail of all customer interactions. The system must maintain a transparent history of transactions, logins, and modifications while supporting compliance with relevant data protection regulations.
